attributes.action: Put some regulations in place to prevent the misuse of the Anti Terrorist laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One thing that disturbs me is that our Government used Anti Terrorist laws to freeze Icelandic assets.

What other things can the anti terrorist laws be used for?
Apart from councils spying on parents?
42 day arrests can wreck someones life, they can lose their job, home , life basically and all justified under the anti terrorist laws.

Just imagine if someone was in power who wanted to remove the opposition.

Wow what a boon these laws would be then! 42 days would be long enough to do serious damage.

IMO we need some sort of regulation to limit how they can be applied.
We need something in place to protect people and set guidelines

I am amazed they were used on Iceland.
Since when have they become Terrorists?
